name: Franky Family
description: A group of ship dismantlers led by Franky in Water 7. They join the battle at Enies Lobby to rescue Franky and support the Straw Hats.

keyMoments.description: The Franky Family breaks out of Enies Lobby alongside Oimo, Kashii, and the Galley-La Company
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the alliance formed to rescue Robin and shows their escape attempt

keyMoments.description: The Franky Family is confronted by three Marine warships
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the danger they face in escaping from Enies Lobby

name: Galley-La Company
description: The premier shipbuilding company in Water 7. The shipwrights join the battle at Enies Lobby to help rescue Robin and settle scores with CP9.

keyMoments.description: Galley-La shipwrights break out of Enies Lobby alongside Oimo, Kashii, and the Franky Family
keyMoments.significance: Shows the united front of Water 7's workers against the World Government

keyMoments.description: Galley-La is confronted by three Marine warships alongside their allies
keyMoments.significance: Highlights the danger all escapees face from Marine forces

name: Marines
description: The World Government's military sea force. In this episode, they execute the Buster Call on Enies Lobby and attempt to prevent any escapes.

keyMoments.description: Three Marine warships confront the escaping allies at the waterfront
keyMoments.significance: Represents the ongoing threat and the World Government's determination to prevent any survivors

keyMoments.description: The Marine Buster Call fleet continues to bombard Enies Lobby
keyMoments.significance: Creates the apocalyptic backdrop and urgency for all escape attempts
